I think I saw a post on here last year with a document that was a listing of all the different types of encounters frameworks for RPG&#39;s. Does anyone know of such a document?<br /><br />It was like:<br />Sneak into <i>________</i> to obtain <i>______</i><br />Protect <i>________</i> long enough for <i>_____</i><br />Don&#39;t let <i>________</i> destroy <i>_____</i><br />Be the first to <i>_____</i> before <i>______</i><br />
